org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.support

Class ProjectConvertors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.support.ProjectConvertors

  • public final class ProjectConvertors
extends Object
    Support for ProjectConvertors.
    Since:
    1.80

    • Method Detail

      • isConvertorProject

        public static boolean isConvertorProject(@NonNull
                                         Project project)
        Checks if the given Project is a artificial one created by a ProjectConvertor.
        Parameters:
        project - the Project to be tested
        Returns:
        true if the Project was created by a ProjectConvertor

      • unregisterConvertorProject

        public static void unregisterConvertorProject(@NonNull
                                              Project project)
        Unregisters the artifical convertor Project from ProjectManager. Unregisters the artifical convertor Project from ProjectManager to allow another Project to take folder ownership. The method should be called only by Project generators when creating a new Project. Requires ProjectManager.mutex() write access.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to be unregistered.
        Since:
        1.81

      • getNonConvertorOwner

        @CheckForNull
public static Project getNonConvertorOwner(@NonNull
                                                         FileObject file)
        Finds the owning non convertor project. Finds nearest enclosing non convertor project.
        Parameters:
        file - the FileObject to find owner for
        Returns:
        the owning Project or null if there is no such a project.
        Since:
        1.82

      • createFileEncodingQuery

        @NonNull
public static FileEncodingQueryImplementation createFileEncodingQuery()
        Creates FileEncodingQueryImplementation delegating to the nearest non convertor project.
        Returns:
        the FileEncodingQueryImplementation
        Since:
        1.82

      • createProjectConvertorLookup

        @NonNull
public static Lookup createProjectConvertorLookup(@NonNull
                                                           Object... instances)
        Creates a Lookup with given instances. The returned Lookup implements Closeable, calling Closeable.close() on it removes all the instances.

        Typical usage would be to pass the Lookup to ProjectConvertor.Result#Result and call Closeable.close() on it in the convertor's project factory before the real project is created.

        Parameters:
        instances - the Lookup content
        Returns:
        the Lookup implementing Closeable
        Since:
        1.82

      • createDelegateToOwnerLookup

        @NonNull
public static Lookup createDelegateToOwnerLookup(@NonNull
                                                          FileObject projectDirectory)
        Creates a Lookup delegating to the owner project.
        Parameters:
        projectDirectory - the convertor project directory
        Returns:
        a Lookup delegating to the owner project
        Since:
        1.85
